document_data.mainbody:
he Wallward was a loosely defined poor neighborhood located in Suldolphor in far eastern Calimshan in the late 14 century DR.
Wallward bordering the Golden Citys interior outer wall. The buildings found here along the wall were much lower quality when compared to those located inward.
Wallward was usually crammed with visiting travelers, adventurers, and anyone else wishing to save some money within the expensive city.
